publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8130 John Swinney: The Local Government Finance (Scotland) Amendment Order 2011—That the Parliament agrees that the Local Government Finance (Scotland) Amendment Order 2011 be approved. Supported by: Bruce Crawford*

S3M-8130 John Swinney: The Local Government Finance (Scotland) Amendment Order 2011—That the Parliament agrees that the Local Government Finance (Scotland) Amendment Order 2011 be approved. Supported by: Bruce Crawford
